title: SunshineDNA
content:
A sameless plug for one of my client’s pro-movie-blogs and the upcoming Sci-fi movie by Danny Boyle… **SunshineDNA**

[Gia Milinovich](http://web.archive.org/web/20060511214323/http:/www.sueridermanagement.co.uk/presenters/Gia/gia.htm) writes the SunshineDNA blog which is a film from Danny Boyle and is using one of my photos on the [blog info…](http://web.archive.org/web/20060511214323/http:/www.sunshinedna.com/?page_id=69)

It looks like a cool movie…so you’re first to know about it.

[http://www.sunshinedna.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060511214323/http:/www.sunshinedna.com/)
author: vinceconnare

comments.content: oops it’s called ‘Sunshine’ the DNA part is the production company of Andrew MacDonald, DNA Films…. (trainspotting, a less ordinary life, the beach).
